July 7, 2021
Goop
He's ok, 4 damage at 45pts is pretty nice. I like that he can quake other squares even while he's tied up. Defense is a bit soft in the middle though.
August 11, 2020
machineman
Good cost-friendly, Hellboy-looking, Gorgon. Allows for at least one higher point Inhuman on the team. I like the seismic stomp special well enough to not miss some of the higher point Gorgon options. Speaking of other inhuman options, what is it with all recent Marvel sets being so Inhuman-friendly? Makes for a good spectrum of Inhuman themes to work with though.
